sense.gloss: protrusion or depression in the middle of an object
center, centre, most important part, main point
fur seal (esp. the northern fur seal, Callorhinus ursinus), Alaskan fur seal
perverseness, perversity, perverse person, difficult person, contrary person
secret savings, secret stash, money hidden away
to (go into a) sulk, to get cranky, to get cross, to become perverse
to regret bitterly, to be very sorry (for), to bite one's navel
to make up one's mind (to do something), to resolve firmly (to do something)

r_ele.r: さいたいけついしょく

sense.gloss: fulcrum peg (fitted into the cavity in an oar as part of a traditional oarlock)
circumference of the navel, treasure trail, sagittal hair

r_ele.r: さいたいじょうみゃく

sense.gloss: what a joke!, don't make me laugh!
to split one's sides laughing, to be convulsed with laughter, to boil tea with one's navel (using the heat generated by laughing)
what a joke!, don't make me laugh!
to split one's sides laughing, to be convulsed with laughter, one's navel boils water (using the heat generated by laughing)

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑臍↑↓ほぞ↓を↑固↑↓かた↓めて↑一世一代↑↓いっせいちだい↓の↑大↑↓だい↓↑事業↑↓じぎょう↓に↑乗↑↓の↓り↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: He resolved to embark on a once-in-a-lifetime enterprise.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑姑↑↓しゅうと↓の↑気↑↓き↓にさわるようなことを↑言↑↓い↓わなければよかったと↑臍↑↓ほぞ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓んだ。
sdata.e: She bitterly regretted having said something that displeased her mother-in-law.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑母↑↓はは↓の↑胎内↑↓たいない↓にいるとき、お↑臍↑↓ほぞ↓の↑穴↑↓あな↓から、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑生↑↓うま↓れる↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓を、↑覗↑↓のぞ↓いてみて、 「こいつは、いけねえ」 　と、↑思↑↓おも↓った。
sdata.e: When I was inside my mother's womb, I looked through my mother's navel at the house where I would be born and I thought: "No way I'm going there".

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑母↑↓はは↓の↑胎内↑↓たいない↓にいるとき、お↑臍↑↓ほぞ↓の↑穴↑↓あな↓から、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑生↑↓うま↓れる↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓を、↑覗↑↓のぞ↓いてみて、 「こいつは、いけねえ」 　と、↑思↑↓おも↓った。
sdata.e: When I was inside my mother's womb, I looked through my mother's navel at the house where I would be born and I thought: "This won't do".
